active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs of using incineration versus other Destroy methods (e.g., shredding or disintegration) for sanitizing high-confidentiality ISM in a data breach scenario. Reference NIST SP 800-88 and prior knowledge of data classification to justify positions.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
